Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This event handler is used for the following events:
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>
